elements.name: require(bool,string)(! paused,all transaction has been paused)

detectors.description:
Pausable.whenNotPaused() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#72-75) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-require(bool,string)(! paused,all transaction has been paused) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#73)
detectors.markdown:
[Pausable.whenNotPaused()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#L72-L75) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-[require(bool,string)(! paused,all transaction has been paused)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#L73)

detectors.description: Flash.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#227-230) ignores return value by super._transferFrom(_sender,_recipient,_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#228)

ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#147-154) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#151)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#152)

detectors.description:
ERC20.allowance(address,address).owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#128) shadows:
	- Owned.owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#41) (state variable)

ERC20._approve(address,address,uint256).owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#178) shadows:
	- Owned.owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#41) (state variable)

Owned.constructor(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#46) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#47)

Owned.transferOwnership(address)._newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#55) lacks a zero-check on :
		- newOwner = _newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#56)
Pragma version^0.7.2 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#1) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11
detectors.markdown: Pragma version[^0.7.2](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Flash.sol#L1) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11
